name: Astro Dome
description:
"You are the Tank Commander on the last Astro Dome defence turret on the mineral rich planet of Sandlada. Fight against incoming astroids and projectiles. Save this precious planet!"

Dev. note: This game is built on some early game mechanics played during my junior years, its a homemage to these games and their inventors. All code, graphics and music was done exclusively for this game in Unity, Asperite, FL-studio, Audacity and VS-code. But some soundeffects was borrowed from various sources including Kenny via OpenGameArt.org.
